title: Location
text:
The apartment is well-connected and makes getting around Dresden very easy
🚋 Public Transport & Getting Around
• Just a few minutes’ walk from the flat, you’ll find two tram stops in different directions. One takes you quickly into the historic city center, where you can explore Dresden’s famous sights like the Frauenkirche, Zwinger, and the Elbe promenade.
• The other tram line leads straight to the Industriegelände area – home to many of Dresden’s techno clubs, bars, and alternative venues. Perfect if you’re planning a night out or want to discover the city’s vibrant nightlife.
🚉 The Dresden-Neustadt train station is only about 5 minutes away and serves as a major hub. From there, you can catch:
• Regional trains and long-distance connections,
• As well as FlixBus services to other cities in Germany and abroad.
Whether you’re here to relax, explore, or dance the night away, the apartment’s location makes it easy to enjoy all sides of Dresden!

title: Welcome
text:
Welcome to my cosy little place, now rented out. 🏡 The flat is decorated in a simple yet warm and welcoming style, with personal touches and green plants 🌿 that bring life to the space. I’ve designed it to be a calming place to unwind, recharge, or simply enjoy a quiet moment.
Get a tour

title: Contact
text: Send me a message about availability and booking. i will get back to you as soon as possible.

title: Things to do
text: I am starting a list of locations for you to visit while in Dresden. I will focus on Neustadt, where all the cool bars, cafes and clubs are located.

title: Things to do
text:
⌘ Points of Interest

🌹 Rosengarten
A beautifully landscaped rose garden along the Elbe River, featuring around 100 different types of roses and various sculptures. Open year-round with free admission.
📍 Carusufer 12, 01099 Dresden
📍 Google Maps


⛪ Martin-Luther-Platz & Martin-Luther-Kirche
A picturesque square surrounded by Gründerzeit architecture, centered around the neo-Gothic Martin Luther Church, which plays a significant role in the city’s cultural life.
📍 Martin-Luther-Platz 5, 01099 Dresden
📍 Google Maps


🌳 Alaunpark
A spacious urban park popular among locals for relaxation, picnics, and outdoor activities. It features playgrounds, sports facilities, and open green spaces.
📍 Bischofsweg, 01099 Dresden
📍 Google Maps


🐎 Goldener Reiter
An iconic gilded equestrian statue of Augustus the Strong, symbolizing Dresden’s rich history. Located at the Neustädter Markt, it’s a prominent landmark in the city.
📍 Hauptstraße 38, 01097 Dresden
📍 Google Maps


⛲ Albertplatz
A central square in Neustadt known for its impressive fountains and as a major tram interchange connecting various parts of the city.
📍 Albertplatz, 01097 Dresden
📍 Google Maps


🎭 Scheune Vorplatz
An open space in front of the Scheune cultural center, often used for public events, markets, and gatherings. It’s a vibrant spot reflecting the district’s artistic spirit.
📍 Alaunstraße 36-40, 01099 Dresden
📍 Google Maps


🪦 Innerer Neustädter Friedhof
One of Dresden’s oldest cemeteries, notable for its baroque grave monuments and as the final resting place for many of the city’s historical figures.
📍 Friedensstraße 2, 01097 Dresden
📍 Google Maps
🎤Events
You can find an up-to-date event calender for Dresden here.

title: Tour
text:
🪴 Feel at Home
This is my home. Be my guest in my tiny flat decorated by me personal touches. I’ve designed it to be a calming place to unwind, recharge, or just enjoy a calm moment.
You’ll find some of my yoga and pilates equipment, which you are very welcome to use during your stay. If you’re looking for a guided session you can use the Apple TV to find insprational videos. For a cozy night in, feel free to explore the streaming platforms available.
📶 Wi-Fi is fast and free throughout the apartment.

🌯 Food & convenience:
A mini-bar area with a fridge, coffee machine, water kettle, and basic utensils and cups is available to enjoy a quiet morning coffee or a small snack.
🍴 The flat doesn’t have a kitchen, you’ll find everything you need for a simple breakfast or evening drink.
There’s a small Imbiss offering takeaway meals, and a Spätshop around the corner is open evenings till 1 am. There you can grab snacks, drinks, or anything you might have forgotten. It’s perfect for late arrivals or quick bites without going far.
Further recommendations for nearby shops, restaurants, bakeries, cafés you will find in the flat.
